attributes.action: Zebra crossing at the top of east hill turning right into park road Dartford kent
attributes.additional_details: There is an extremely dangerous zebra crossing at the top of east hill dartford Kent, the crossing is at the top of park road, this is a busy road and used by many heavy vehicles, there are 2 schools nearby, so used by many school children, my daughter has just had twins, my experience of using this crossing this week has horrified me, vehicles approach the crossing at high speeds and when turning left onto it a sharp bend. According to dartford borough council there has not been a fatality there,lets keep it that way and petition to have it moved further down the road to a safer position please support this e petition for the safety of the local community ....

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
